com.ihealth.communication.control

Class HsControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.HsControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class HsControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Created by jing on 16/8/30.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HsControl(android.content.Context context, com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseComm mBaseComm, com.ihealth.communication.base.ble.BleComm bleComm, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String mac, java.lang.String type, com.ihealth.communication.ins.InsCallback insCallback, com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseCommCallback mBaseCommCallback)
      the construct of Hs3Control.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy() 
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect device This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately. If disconnect successfully, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String mac, String deviceType, int status, int errorID)
      The status will be 2(iHealthDevicesManager.DEVICE_STATE_DISCONNECTED). Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
      iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
      void getBattery()
      Get battery for Continua HS device This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately.
      void getFeature()
      get the feature for Continua HS device Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly. This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately.
      void getMeasurement()
      get measurement result for Continua HS device Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly. This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately.
      void init()
      Initializes method Used to create communication channels with CHS.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public HsControl(android.content.Context context,
                 com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseComm mBaseComm,

                 java.lang.String userName,
                 java.lang.String mac,
                 java.lang.String type,
                 com.ihealth.communication.ins.InsCallback insCallback,
                 com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseCommCallback mBaseCommCallback)
        the construct of Hs3Control.
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        mBaseComm - a class of communication.
        bleComm - a class of communication.
        userName - user identify card
        mac - valid Bluetooth address(without colon).
        type - type of iHealth device iHealthDevicesManager.TYPE_CHS
        insCallback - Continua HS device callback
        mBaseCommCallback - communication callback

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes method
        • Used to create communication channels with CHS.
        • Attention, this method calls after creating the Hs3Control object.
        • In iHealthDevicesManager.createControl(BaseComm btct, String mac, String name, boolean needReadEE) method is invoked for the first time.
        Specified by:
        init in interface DeviceControl

      • getBattery

        public void getBattery()
        Get battery for Continua HS device
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately.
        • After getting the activity data, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be ACTION_BATTERY_CHS.
          • The keys of message will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • getFeature

        public void getFeature()
        get the feature for Continua HS device
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.

      • getMeasurement

        public void getMeasurement()
        get measurement result for Continua HS device
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the measurement result, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is HsProfile.ACTION_CHS_MEASUREMENT_DATA, the keys of message will show in KeyList of the action.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Description copied from interface: DeviceControl
        Disconnect device
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If disconnect successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String mac, String deviceType, int status, int errorID)
          • The status will be 2(iHealthDevicesManager.DEVICE_STATE_DISCONNECTED).
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface DeviceControl

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface DeviceControl
